sentences.sContent: These genes are needed for cell respiration, and without them eukaryotic cells die.
sentences.sContent_eng: These genes are needed for cell respiration, and without them eukaryotic cells die.
sentences.sCn: 这些基因的细胞都需要呼吸，如果没有它们，真核细胞就会死亡。

sentences.sContent: This overturns the traditional view that the jump to complex 'eukaryotic' cells simply required the right kinds of mutations.
sentences.sContent_eng: This overturns the traditional view that the jump to complex 'eukaryotic' cells simply required the right kinds of mutations.
sentences.sCn: 这颠覆了传统的观点，即实现复杂的'真核'细胞的跳跃发展仅仅要求正确种类的突变。

sentences.sContent: These compartmentalised cells are called 'eukaryotic', and they all share a common ancestor that arose just once in four billion years of evolution.
sentences.sContent_eng: These compartmentalised cells are called 'eukaryotic', and they all share a common ancestor that arose just once in four billion years of evolution.
sentences.sCn: 这些划分的细胞被称为“真核生物”，它们源于一个共同的祖先，在四十亿年的进化出现只有一次。
